Nicknames: I Bianconeri (The White and Blacks) I Friulani (The Friulians) Le Zebrette (The Little Zebras)
Founded: 30 November 1896 ; 128 years ago ( 30 November 1896 ) as Società Udinese di Ginnastica e Scherma. 5 July 1911 ; 114 years ago ( 5 July 1911 ) as Associazione del Calcio Udine 1919 ; 106 years ago ( 1919 ) as Associazione Sportiva Udinese 1925 ; 100 years ago ( 1925 ) as Associazione Calcio Udinese 1978 ; 47 years ago ( 1978 ) as Udinese Calcio
